descriptionHTML:
Pet world is so marvelous – have you ever dreamed to feel like a little dog roaming through the large human house? Here’s your chance! Become this spotty type of a dog – a Dalmatian – and search for your own place in the human world playing My Dalmatian Dog Sim - Home Pet Life game!

LEARN MORE ABOUT THIS STUNNING BREED
• Did you know that Dalmatian puppies are born with plain white coats and their first spots usually appear within 3 to 4 weeks after birth? It’s amazing!
• Start your adventure being just a little pup, and watch every little black spot appearing on your fluffy fur!
• This breed is absolutely unique – nothing in common with Corgi, German Shepherd, Boxer, Rottweiler, Scotch Terrier, Bulldog, Chihuahua and Shiba Inu!

CHOOSE ANY LIFESTYLE YOU WANT
• Fighting or making friends? Or maybe even mating and procreation? Everything depends on your own choice!
• Remember that this house is full of dangers and mysteries, so complete some missions to become more dexterous and solve them all!
• You may meet some unfriendly animals (or maybe even humans) here, but don’t be sad about this fact: just fight and earn some experience points to level up!

EXPLORE THIS INTERESTING PLACE
• What can be more interesting than creating your own doggy family and protecting it from some cruel creatures? Nothing, we’re sure!
• Complete different survival, fighting, exploration and family missions to earn some points and unlock more interesting skins for your doggo;
• Search for something interesting in this huge house made in highly developed 3D graphics and enjoy the dog’s life!

Join the doggo world being this kind of breed and become just happy Dalmatian dog playing My Dalmatian Dog Sim - Home Pet Life!

Privacy policy: http://animalswildlifestu.wixsite.com/animalswildlife/single-post/2017/07/27/ANIMALS-WILDLIFE-STUDIO-PRIVACY-POLICY
summary: Join the doggo world being a Dalmatian dog!
title: My Dalmatian Dog Sim - Home Pet Life

description: Build, upgrade and defend your very own medieval castle! Use strategy and command your army of holy knights to attack your enemies (or friends) and battle your way to glory in this new game - PaladinZ: Champions of Might! PaladinZ is simple and easy to play, this game is a combination of strategy, magic, knights, and some funny jokes. It requires you plan how to protect your castle (don’t just build and upgrade everything you can in a random order) and plan your attacks carefully (just sending every knight you have won’t cut it) in order to win every battle and make your Lord  - THE Lord of the Land.Game Features:✔ Build and upgrade your very own medieval castle✔ Place your defences strategically and defend against other players’ attacks✔ Watch out and protect your lands from the Poachers✔ Train your army of funny characters - Spearmen, Archers, Witches, Griffons and more✔ Upgrade and evolve your army into an unbeatable force ✔ Battle players worldwide and take their Gold, Food and Trophies✔ Challenge your friends to see who has the best army and who is the better Lord✔ Discover your favorite attack and defence forces from countless combinations of units✔ Watch replays of every battle - Watch your holy army in battle to improve your strategy✔ See how you compare to other players worldwide in Google Achievements and Ranking✔ Knights & castles themed graphics and sounds with adorable, funny characters✔ Free action charged strategy game - You have to have strategy in your attacks!✔ Play as either a male or a female and command your army of holy knights to victory!Join the PaladinZ Community and get updates, participate in competitions or just watch some funny videos of our holy knights:Like us:   https://www.facebook.com/PaladinZGame/Terms of Service: http://www.spartonix.com/#/termsPrivacy Policy: http://www.spartonix.com/#/privacy

Build, upgrade and defend your very own medieval castle! Use strategy and command your army of holy knights to attack your enemies (or friends) and battle your way to glory in this new game - PaladinZ: Champions of Might!

comments: Just way too many ads. Eventually you start having to watch an ad after every second other level. Its a free game, so I get it but the levels are so quick sometimes I'm watching more than I am playing. Fun game, though. Easy controls and great graphics and sound.

This game is outstanding. Love the graphics, simple to understand. Some appear quite easy and then you suddenly get a level that looks like it should be but has you scratching your head for AGES!!! Love it. I can live with the adverts, just wish i could put the phone down.

Good fun and very addictive. I see people moaning about the adds 😧 but what can you expect from a free game? You get an add pop up after about 5 puzzles and to be honest it is only for a few seconds....just close it if you don't want to see them.

Wonderful game, excellent graphics, its a free game, I solve 2 puzzles and a video ad plays I cant get over it, ad's are repeatedly played and I can't skip, but uninstalling cos too too much of ad's... after 2nd level game is very easy didn't find much interesting..

Agree with other comments. Great graphics, fun to play, but the ADS!!!!!!!! eventually destroy the fun. Very repetitive after a while and challenge levels seem quite mixed. Have decided to delete the game mainly because of the ad onslaught. Other games have a much better ad/play psychology approach.
Great time killer and keeps the brain ticking good fun. Ads are annoying but it's free and you can pay about £1.50 to get rid of them if your that bothered 🤔

description: In World Crafting Empire you'll explore a beautiful world and mine thousands of blocks with one swipe of your finger. Befriend mobs and animals to mine by your side and craft awesome gear like potions, enchanted books, furnaces and pickaxes to enhance your journey. This is the world's best incremental idle mining and crafting game!7 REASONS TO BUILD YOUR OWN WORLD CRAFTING EMPIRE!~~~~~~~~~~* SWIPE TO MINE - Tap n’ swipe to mine thousands of blocks and resources instantly.* BEFRIEND MOBS – Save animals and mobs trapped in jelly to mine for you while you’re away!* CRAFT AWESOME GEAR - Use your resources to craft everything from Nether Bricks to Eyes of Ender.* EXPLORE A WORLD - Explore and discover beautiful scenic biomes as your adventure develops.* FRENZIED MINING – Tornados, TNT, and a giant golden hammer harvest entire chunks in an instant!* INVEST WISELY - Prove your RPG strategy with smart decisions on which gear and mobs to befriend, craft and upgrade.* PLAY ANYWHERE! - The world’s best idle mining and crafting game is free to play online or offline!Support: https://futureplaygames.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/categories/360000030191-Craft-Away-Privacy Policy: http://www.futureplaygames.com/privacypolicy.htmlTerms of Service: http://www.futureplaygames.com/termsofservice.html

description: Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!
descriptionHTML:
Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!

Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!

Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!

You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!

Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!

As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.

So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!

comments: Great game. But what I miss are written below.   1. Direct search & contact any city.   2. Invite a city to be friend from within game.   3. Direct private message with a city from within Game.   4. Make a city tagged as favourite city or liked city.   5. Want a clean viewing mode of own city without those construction hats and other info symbols on top of  building being constructed.  I think they are massively missed. And if you can provide these facilities then it will be the best game of it's class.

By a stroke of luck I got my old game back in February 2018 after a span of a year and a month. Good to be back. A suggestion : why don't you have something like a banking system wherein you can exchange the different currencies in play in the game. There could be a selling price and a purchase price which gives the bank a margin

The movement and the ability to delete structures for refund could be better. Trading HQ could be so much better, my main concern are the loading screens. Perhaps instead of loading the whole city a separate map viewer could be opened that shows general statistics and layout but not the entire city. That way trading could be done faster between cities and there would be more involvement with the trading community. As it stands its a real chore and is deterring me from trading as much as I'd like. Another idea is if the stock market could be integrated somehow. I think that would be cool, and it would add an element of realism.

They could tweak a few things such as being able to pack items as you reach necessary amount when increasing storage capacity. Considering I'm at the point I need 19 of each item (and yet it still only increases by 5) it takes up way too much space. Certain items take way too much time to produce and practically impossible to find in the trade depot. Aside from those and a few other things, I really enjoy this game.

Thanks for new upgrade . Even when the game was slow i didn't stop playing. I love this game. It's not only a game for me...i am a President of my club and i have to lead my members... in less than one year i reached level 50 and almost all land expanded...just  you have to understand how to play... be smart... some advice for beginners  start participate in mayor competition...this way you will grow faster

I absolutely love this game. I play it all throughout the day. I've made really good friends with the people in my club, and we are all over the somewhat new "club wars" feature. There was a lag, but it was recently fixed. There's always something to do in this game, and you can play at your own pace. You don't have to spend real money to play the game, but I'll admit that I spend a dollar every now and then for the 30 days of green buck income. I love this game so much that I've even started a second city on another device with my other email.
description: Welcome, Mayor! Be the hero of your very own city as you design and create a beautiful, bustling metropolis. Every decision is yours as your city gets larger and more intricate. Make smart choices to keep your citizens happy and your skyline growing. Then trade, chat, compete, and join clubs with fellow Mayors. Build your way to extraordinary with the most popular city builder on mobile!BRING YOUR CITY TO LIFEBuild skyscrapers, parks, landmarks, factories, and much more! Place buildings strategically to keep the taxes flowing and your city growing. Solve real-life challenges like traffic, fires, and pollution. Provide services like power plants and police departments, and boost your population with parks and education. Keep traffic moving with grand avenues and streetcars. Take on fun challenges to shape your society.PUT YOUR IMAGINATION ON THE MAPExpand along the beach with a marina, waterpark, and luxury beachfront. Build a Tokyo-style neighborhood and unlock exclusive landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Statue of Liberty. Discover innovative technologies with Future Cities and get athletic with sports stadiums. Hit the town with Las Vegas buildings and go Hollywood with movie studios. There’s always something new and different to make your city unique.BATTLE YOUR WAY TO VICTORYCompete in real-time PvP with Club Wars, where you strategize with Mayor’s Club members and declare war on other cities. Once the battle is on, unleash crazy disasters on opponents, like the Disco Twister and Plant Monster, to do damage and watch the wreckage happen live. Earn disaster cards, SimCash, and other valuables to use in battle or to improve your city. Also, take on other players in the Contest of Mayors. Complete weekly challenges and climb the ranks to advance through Leagues. Become a top Mayor and get rewards that can upgrade and beautify your city.CONNECT AND TEAM UPJoin a Mayor’s Club to trade supplies with other members and chat about strategies and available resources. Collaborate to help someone complete their personal vision and get support to complete yours. Build big, work together, lead other Mayors, and watch your city come to life!-------User Agreement: terms.ea.com/enPrivacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/en Visit https://help.ea.com/en/ for assistance or inquiries. Important Consumer Information.  This app:  Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Contains advertisements for EA and its partners. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details).  Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. Good but buggy Good but buggy, one can earn infinite money in no time then u can upgrade ur vehicle to the max in the very first level. That destroys the fun of the game. Second if u have money in millions, the cost of the parts are also in million and so on, and even having millions of dollars in the game u might fail to upgrade vehicle sometimes  that makes no sense.

Fun game but janky/sketchy ads. The ads will unmute your device and turn up the volume before they play, over and over again, so you can't​ play the game anywhere quiet. The "x" button on the ads is not in the right position, so tapping it doesn't close the ad and you have to hunt for the hidden close button. Bunch of the ads never load and just show a empty gray screen.

My problem with the gane comes from some sort of bug that started like an ad mid-run, then it started doing some weird rainbow pattern that flipped 90 degrees every few seconds. Now the game doesnt function when you try to start a run and the problem even persisted to my home screen before I closed the application.
description: Drive your car through a zombie apocalypse in this massive follow-up to the chart-topping hit Earn to Die!An evacuation ship is waiting on the other side of the country. The only thing that stands in your way: city after city overrun by zombies . With only a run-down car and a small amount of cash you face a familiar situation... to drive through hordes of zombies in order to survive!BRAND NEW STORY MODEEarn to Die 2 introduces a massive new Story Mode, five times longer than its predecessor. The game departs its familiar desert setting and delves into the depths of cities infested by zombies. MULTI-TIERED LEVELS:Levels are now multi-tiered! Drive across decayed highway overpasses, via underground tunnels, or smash through epic zombie filled factories. Whichever path you choose to take, you won't be able to escape the zombie hordes - your only choice is to smash through them!BUILD A ZOMBIE-SMASHING MACHINEUnlock and upgrade 10 different vehicles, including a sports car, a fire truck, and even an ice-cream van. Each vehicle can be equipped with a range of upgrades, such as armored frames, roof-mounted guns, boosters and more. Those zombies will stand no chance.DESTRUCTIBLE VEHICLESVehicles are now fully destructible. Hang on for your life as your vehicle gets smashed to smithereens if you aren't too careful.MORE ZOMBIES. MORE DESTRUCTION. MORE MAYHEM.What are you waiting for? That rescue ship isn't going to wait forever! Prepare yourself for a wild ride - and seriously, there is nothing like smashing through zombie-filled factories!Earn to Die 2 is a bigger and better version of the original web series which includes Earn to Die 2012 and Earn to Die 2: Exodus.Earn to Die 2 is free-to-play, however contains 3rd-party advertising and optional in-app purchases.For more information on advertising, please see our Privacy Policy: http://www.notdoppler.com/earntodie2/privacypolicy.phpRequired Permissions FAQ:WRITE/READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is required to load and display ads in game (Earn to Die 2 is an ad-supported game).
descriptionHTML:
Drive your car through a zombie apocalypse in this massive follow-up to the chart-topping hit Earn to Die!

An evacuation ship is waiting on the other side of the country. The only thing that stands in your way: city after city overrun by zombies . With only a run-down car and a small amount of cash you face a familiar situation... to drive through hordes of zombies in order to survive!

BRAND NEW STORY MODE
Earn to Die 2 introduces a massive new Story Mode, five times longer than its predecessor. The game departs its familiar desert setting and delves into the depths of cities infested by zombies.

MULTI-TIERED LEVELS:
Levels are now multi-tiered! Drive across decayed highway overpasses, via underground tunnels, or smash through epic zombie filled factories. Whichever path you choose to take, you won't be able to escape the zombie hordes - your only choice is to smash through them!

BUILD A ZOMBIE-SMASHING MACHINE
Unlock and upgrade 10 different vehicles, including a sports car, a fire truck, and even an ice-cream van. Each vehicle can be equipped with a range of upgrades, such as armored frames, roof-mounted guns, boosters and more. Those zombies will stand no chance.

DESTRUCTIBLE VEHICLES
Vehicles are now fully destructible. Hang on for your life as your vehicle gets smashed to smithereens if you aren't too careful.

MORE ZOMBIES. MORE DESTRUCTION. MORE MAYHEM.
What are you waiting for? That rescue ship isn't going to wait forever! Prepare yourself for a wild ride - and seriously, there is nothing like smashing through zombie-filled factories!

Earn to Die 2 is a bigger and better version of the original web series which includes Earn to Die 2012 and Earn to Die 2: Exodus.

Earn to Die 2 is free-to-play, however contains 3rd-party advertising and optional in-app purchases.
For more information on advertising, please see our Privacy Policy: http://www.notdoppler.com/earntodie2/privacypolicy.php


Required Permissions FAQ:
WRITE/READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is required to load and display ads in game (Earn to Die 2 is an ad-supported game).
developerAddress: Suite 1010, Level 10, 250 Pitt Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000, Australia
recentChanges: Surviving Story Mode was only just the beginning...
- Steer your vehicles through each level (and through zombie hordes) in search for hidden Survival Kits.
- 60 Survival Kits hidden across 15 level segments. Can you collect them all?
summary: Drive your car through a zombie apocalypse in this epic sequel to Earn to Die!
title: Earn to Die 2

comments: Being honest this is the best puzzle game I've played so far with some really new concepts. The game is so finished and classy. Just fell in love with this game. This game gave me a thought that there could never be any other puzzle game better than it but right after i completed this game i came to know about its sequel 'RED' and i am looking forward to it. RED is already in download. Super excited to play it. Awesome work BART.❤️

You're just plain fun! You really understand the right amount of challenge to keep it fun but not aggravating. Have to admit I did use some hints. May I make a teeny weeny suggestion. Make a link at end to "rate the game," I wanted to, looked around, in end clicked link to play red then find yellow to do this rating... that's cuz I like yah... thanks for the smile!

This is as simple as it can be, yet perfect in every way. Relaxing music that doesn't distract you from your game, smooth gameplay, easy controls. I liked the fact that you are tossed into the game without any tutorials, left on your own. I am not really into puzzle games but I completed this game in a single afternoon and it had me asking for more.

Just finished this one less than 5 minutes ago, I'd definitely have to say I enjoyed red more. yellow had some more difficult puzzles. Some of them were (kinda?) reused in red. I overall enjoyed it a lot!   I'm really looking forward to the next one!

It's so captivating I finished it in a single morning! I love how challenging the puzzles are at the same time they are fun. The level 49 made me go crazy because I couldn't get it right, I had to draw the squares  so I wouldn't press the wrong one. I totally loved it and I'm so going to download red!

The color... Only yellow..its just yellow!! I've played this game once amd its taken over my life. My bedroom walls were once blue..now all I see is yellow! My red hair is yellow, my brown cat is yellow.. Everything IS YELLOW. As I sink further into the eternal abyss of yellow, I can only scream. God has abandoned this app.. God save us all
description: Yellow, a puzzle game for you!Can you make the screen yellow in all 50 levels?Each level has its own logic.A Bart Bonte / bontegames puzzle game.

comments: I'm incredibly thankful for this game. Finally there is a game that is enjoyable, relaxing, calming and the best way to take my mind off of the worries all around us. Words cannot fully express what this game means to me! Thanks to the developers I look forward to playing everytime. The music is wonderful! I highly recommend this game. Thanks again ♡

As much as I understand that you want to make a few bucks, the amount of advertising and the way the advertising is being presented has gradually become quite intrusive and annoying. I would much rather pay a one time license fee that this crabby implementation of user annoyance  / advertising. The other problem is that on the high end phones (read pixel 2) the board are so big that the tiles as a consequence are made very small so they fit with a final result that makes it very difficult to see/read

I think the game is great. I love Mahjong. I'm unhappy that I paid 1.99 to stop the ads but when I collect my 2,000 coin bonus I still have to watch an ad to receive the bonus. I will not be paying 1.99 next month just to still have to watch ads.
The latest update places advertising banners in the play area. You can't move them or play around them and I don't want to install the advertisement app.  They suck out loud.
Addicting! Amazing! And when you message support for anything, you get a HUMAN replying, (not some automated reply) and they are awesome! Love everything about this game!

Does not even lay tiles down in a solvable fashion. Had no repeats thus shud be solvable in any order, wasn't, what's the point? Sort ur algorithm out.  Also, non stop ads and u want us to pay monthly for ad free? £8 one off fee wud b highest I went for an app I'd want to keep

comments: This game us soooo fun and I love it! Great time waster/spender. The only thing is That the super bonus is quite litterally, rigged. I have never gotten any number other than 0 in the thousands place value of the spinner. Please tell me I'm not the only one. Still a great game! Also I'd love to have a private sandbox room and stuff like powers that you can fiddle with with friends in a private room, just like most .io games it doesn't have one.

Love it!! So far uncontaminated by bots and hackers. Very very addictive and easy to learn! A few too many adds for my tastes (one every time you loose) which is why I rated 4 stars but if they were skippable instantly (except the ones you opt into watching) I'd gladly up it to 5 stars!

Okay, I've got a short list of cons. With the right or left joystick, it's hard to go down, because there's an AD BLOCKING THE BOTTOM! That kills my rating of the controls.  Graphics are okay. And it's very easy to master. Like, second game, first place. Last thing, ITS A RIPOFF OF HEXAR.IO! Really? Make your own game concept. Don't steal someones idea for your own good. Want better controls? Play Hexar. Want no ads blocking the controls? Play Hexar. Want a better game overall? Play Hexar.

I'm not sure what everybody else thinks so I'm going to base this review on my opinion. Lots of people are saying that the bonus coin machine is rigged and that you can only get zero in the thousands but I guarantee you that I have got in the 1000's before. The graphics are great the multiple control iodine give the game an element of diversity and its really simple I definitely recommend playing this game. Sure there are a few things that need fixing but they don't change the game necessarily.

I absolutely LOVE the game!! To be honest, seeing this on Play Store page I thought: :Its just another .io game.' I installed it.. Never am I gonna think that again!! Rated 5 stars ★ cause it is so addictive,fun it reminds me of.. String 😂. If your someone thinking if you should get this game or not and come across this then let me say. No I'm not (that) crazy, Its totally worth getting this game if your stuck and nothing to do. 😊

Paper and hex io are good, but this has harder opponents... and toys to play with. Many ads but you can buy to get rid of them except as ways to get extra lives... Which also gives other people chances to eat your area which is fine..  Can't figure out how to earn coins... I died real quick once and got nearly 8k coins... The. Got 100 percent and got 1k coins... Seems you should get 5 percent then run into a wall.

comments: Great game. Loving it. I noticed when you go into the Alter, there is a note telling you your capacity limit at the bottom but in the Mana gem screen it doesn't tell you. Are you able to add this feature? I can never remember my mana creating limit.  If you make more mana than can fit in your mana storage line, you lose the excess.

AWESOME!!! Originally, I was very reluctant to download this becuase I though it was going to be where you just sit and watch your character do everything for you. I HATE those types of games... This however is actually how I was really hoping it would turn out to be! You can move freely! The levels are linear and its not very open, but thats okay! You see each piece of equipment on your character when you wear it, which is absolutely essential to me! I will not play a game where my appearance does not change, so this has all in all met my expectations! Another RPG worthy of my collection! Thank you!!!

Got a decent purple weapon in the box drop, after 2 areas the game just got idioticaly gindy after just 5 days of casual play. If you cannot keep me for at least one month ingame i will never ever pay for a game with no actual free reward!

Every time there's an update you get thrown backwards X 10! I was movin along at a steady pace but now since the update I havent been able to advance 1 area! Even the arena battles arent winnable. Not fun at all anymore. This coming from someone who played religiously every day for 6 months or longer 👎

Only problem I have with the game is if you don't spend actual money to get what you need healing potions, coins ,etc. After about 20 hrs of play. your pretty much at a massive slow down. Other than that the game is very cool. Addictive then a let down! Still playing anyway.

I am uninstalling this game unless you give me back my power and previous level before the update. You reduced my power, but all levels are at the same difficulty level. That is not adjusting difficulty, that is infuriating.
description: Heed the call of the magicians guild - conjurers, witches, archers and templars are needed! Monsters and dragons roam the realm, and your friends have already picked up the gauntlet, bow and arrow as well as sorcerer hats to raid dungeons, gain fame, and fight warlocks in the arena against other guilds!Guild of Heroes delivers everything the classic fantasy has to offer, with devious dwarves and ancient elves, nasty orc shamans and troll sorcery, epic action and dark caves, quests and raids as befits the best medieval style RPG in the lineage of tabletop games.However, the epic journey through the huge, colorful game world is not only fairy tales of mystic dungeons and dragons, but also battle against mages in the arena, controlled by other players!In a nutshell:★ Action-packed fantasy RPG in best game graphics★ Equip character classes such as mage, hunter and warrior, interchangeable at any time★ PVP against other teams in arena guild wars★ Craft medieval weapons and armor with hundreds of combinations★ Thousands of different monsters from diabolic exorcists to ... oh, discover for yourself!Now, enough of the heroic ballads; grab your wand, sword and shield, and into the best, free fantasy RPG you'll ever experience!Oh, do not forget: Follow the Guild of Heroes Community on Facebook - Events, Fan Art, Guild Friends and Contests are waiting to be explored!
descriptionHTML:
Heed the call of the magicians guild - conjurers, witches, archers and templars are needed! Monsters and dragons roam the realm, and your friends have already picked up the gauntlet, bow and arrow as well as sorcerer hats to raid dungeons, gain fame, and fight warlocks in the arena against other guilds!

Guild of Heroes delivers everything the classic fantasy has to offer, with devious dwarves and ancient elves, nasty orc shamans and troll sorcery, epic action and dark caves, quests and raids as befits the best medieval style RPG in the lineage of tabletop games.

However, the epic journey through the huge, colorful game world is not only fairy tales of mystic dungeons and dragons, but also battle against mages in the arena, controlled by other players!

In a nutshell:
★ Action-packed fantasy RPG in best game graphics
★ Equip character classes such as mage, hunter and warrior, interchangeable at any time
★ PVP against other teams in arena guild wars
★ Craft medieval weapons and armor with hundreds of combinations
★ Thousands of different monsters from diabolic exorcists to ... oh, discover for yourself!

Now, enough of the heroic ballads; grab your wand, sword and shield, and into the best, free fantasy RPG you'll ever experience!

Oh, do not forget: Follow the Guild of Heroes Community on Facebook - Events, Fan Art, Guild Friends and Contests are waiting to be explored!
recentChanges: ◆ Guild Wars is a new 25 vs 25 asynchronous PvP game mode
◆ Battlegrounds: 24 new levels across 4 types of terrain
◆ New reward type: guild banners which grant bonuses for all guild members
◆ Guild Tournament: guilds will be ranked based on the amount of trophies won in wars. The higher a guild’s rank, the better the rewards it gets.
◆ Treasury: donate gold and contribute to your guild's success
◆ The game has been rebalanced for a better single and multiplayer gameplay
summary: Explore the greatest role-playing game as wizard, bowman or knight!
title: Guild of Heroes - fantasy RPG

Whether you like skating street, or big ramps, bowls and half pipes, Skating FE3D has it all, completely free!

comments: Is it just me or does this happen to everyone? When I use a power up like 2X or instant bingo, does it land on the same number? I had an "instant bingo" land on B9 on three different cards (B9 was never called)! Same with most power ups! Just curious!!!

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

Okay, I play these games when I wake up and this one costs a fortune to play!!! Then, I have found with the challenges it doesnt give you credit as it should for utilizing the power ups you bought. I just used two for a challenge, and it never registered. If youre willing to dump money this is the ideal game  Oh and you cant reach support through the app to discuss these mistakes so....youre SOL when the game messes up. After spending oodles on this game, time to delete.

comments: I'm glad I found this little gem of a sim. The only thing that I would like to see improved is making it a little harder to knock down the strictures, with most one solid hit and it brings its self down. This needs work. It is one of the best building destroyer sim out there. Highly recommend. In hope this keeps getting more development because it has a ton of potential. Only thing I don't like is ad placement. I understand the need for ads but not on the main play screen. Like everyone else says it does need more structures, give us an update devs.

I don't play games on my phone a lot but this is one of my favorite ever! I've been addicted to this game, I just wish I had more variety of buildings or stronger buildings. Or a way to design your own buildings or structures! Please don't change anything just add more to it I don't know why this is not more popular I love it!!!

This game is great and entertaining, not only do you get physics and destruction on a mobile platform you also get 13 diffrent structures to play with. Overall great game. Only suggestion i would have would be to have an added tower thats supertall and hard to knock down.

Great simulation, remote bombs are very satisfying.  Enhancements could include;  build your own structure mode; replay from different angles and scoring (how much destruction from hit).  Agree it is a bit easy to destroy everything but that suits the end of a hard day.

I wanted to give this a 5, it's brilliant. The way it's delivered is superb, I love the graphics, it's simply excellent. The reason I didn't is because I want the developers to add to it. Make strong buildings. Give me things to destroy that require excessive destruction and assault not just a single heavy ball every time. Maybe introduce a minimum break point between blocks. That... I'd gladly pay for. Anyway, bravo.

Speaking straight out, I would recommend to improve the graphics. Also, you people should definitely consider adding more customisations such as friction of the green platform, gravity's intensity (magnitude of accl. due to gravity), intensity of bombs. Please see to it that the remote bombs don't remain stuck in air (and to the building instead) when the building collapses after being fired with remote bombs. Overall : 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 😉 Keep it up.

comments: Cute graphics, easy controls, easy game. It jumps right into things with no real breaks. Generally just hella easy and idle so not my deal personally....though the feverish tapping is a nice way to burn off nervous energy.
I don't mind this game although they could have it be more interactive. Its a nice tap game but It gets boring after a bit.
It is a very cute game, and I do enjoy playing it.. just not much point to it, you basically just tap and level up... but you only go in one direction... nothing else..
It's pretty and fun and not hard at all. You have to tap a lot to kill monsters which has this kind of fidget-relief aspect.
Adorable, simple game. My only problem is that whenever I try to do something that involves watching a video, the crashes.
I'm not usually one for tapping games, but this one is actually really cute and seems really well done so far.

comments: Come for the cats, stay for the cats. Very fun, no-pressure non-competitive collection and idle management game. Graphics are great, the gameplay is simple to grasp but has a bit of strategy to it, the devs are attentive and responsive. A true freemium: completists may want to spend money to get even more cats and support the devs but that's it. It's one of the rare games where free players don't miss out on anything or aren't slowed down. Looking forward to chat improvements so I can give it 5*.

I really like this game! Not only is it incredibly addictive (thank goodness you can play offline), but the art and story is both awesome and adorable. I chuckle all the time whenever I win, get a hero or just a little "haha" moment in the story. Sometimes I even play the minigames and watch the ads not for the double gold or energy potions. In a nutshell, if you like cats, fun, humor and zombie dogs, then this is the perfect game for you.

IT'S SO ADDICTING I love this game. Why? 1. I 💟 Cats. 2. It's a great time killer. 3. The cats are so CUTE 4. I'm obsessed. 5. All my friends think that this game is cool.  This game lags alot tough. But it's fine. It doesn't lag for a long time.⏳  It's really cool when the cats evolve. They change their outfits and if you evolve alot of times, they could have 2 powers.   The mythic is the BEST. They're powerful and cool. I like their 2nd and 3rd outfits. Kinda expensive for the cats to evolve for mythic.  Rare is also cool. They are less expensive than the mythic. But, they use the same embers. The embers they use to evolve is not easy to get.  Common... Cheap, but cool. They use different embers and it's easier to get.  I love the battles. You are doing the same thing over and over again but it is very addicting.  Overall, this game is amazing. Download it.

I absolutely love this game! The only problem is that it tends to crash every so often on my Moto phone(I use a Moto g5), but I am aware that this issue is being looked into by the devs. The story is amazing(Especially the Valentine's event story) and I find it interesting on how all the cats have all these unique phrases! Awesome game, PocApp Studios!

This is an amazing game! I love everything about it! My one problem is that the quests respond relatively slowly, but that is a very small problem because they eventually respawn. Also some quests are level based and all of them require certain a skill(s). If you are interested in this game know that there are many amazing things about this game that should make you want to install this! I know this is supposed to be a short review, but when there are so many awesome things (and I am not great with the term short in writing) about this game I can't help writing so much about it. Overall amazing and addictive game. You may be personally offended if out of the two, cats and dogs, you like dogs better. Luckily for me I love them both the same! Hope this review was helpful!

It's a great game really! But lately I've noticed that my game is a bit zoomed in, like when I go to the upgrades for cloth and stuff the gems and coins are like cut off in the middle and I wanted to dismiss some cats that I already got but the button is cut off so I can't see or click it. Wondering if that is the game or not because I've tried to see if it's my phone but nothing works to make the game screen zoom out a bit.

descriptionHTML:
Start your transportation business and grow your island into an economic superpower!

Transport goods from farms and mines to factories and cities to deliver what they need. Your island will grow and prosper to be the envy of the world.

Make cities grow, find more resources, manufacture high-tech goods and build the transportation empire of your dreams. Collect the shiniest fleet of trucks, and other vehicles (buses, airports etc. coming soon!).

You can download and play the game for free. There are also in-game purchases which can be used to enrich and accelerate the experience even further.

Features:

* Grow and develop your island and cities
* Deliver tasty goods like fruit, sweets and juices
* Find natural resources and process them into advanced goods
* Collect and upgrade the shiniest fleet of trucks and other vehicles
* Build roads and upgrade them into multi-lane freeways
* Level up to gain access to better vehicles and reveal your island completely!

------------
Support:
------------

Hey tycoon! Have you run into problems? Help and support from transitking@bongames.fi, or in-game > Settings > Contact Support.

comments: Love this game. But always watching videos is becoming a drag. Cant win gems very often. Freezing has been sorta fixed but now there is an issue of video (as much as i hats them) loading failure. Ive lost out on double coins or 2nd life and is annoying (but not as annoying as videos)

I was happy to see this game updating on my phone, but instead of working on optimizations, you went ahead and went even heavier on the microtransactions. Game still has an awful framerate on my phone which makes timing the jumps on the hardest levels impossible. My phone is last gen, so it can't be the problem.  It's a shame you guys are giving Simon's Cat such a bad reputation with this game. I'm uninstalling.

Amazing game. One suggestion though. After you in pause the game, there needs to be a short count down so you don't crash or anything.  UPDATE: to many microtransactions! Gems need to be somewhat easier to get, and for the love of our sanity PLEASE change the sound of collecting butterflies to somthing not as loud and annoying.

Gameplay is fun and kid-friendly. Rewards are well-paced. Randomly-generated levels keep it fresh. Had some issues with the "watch ad to double this reward" feature not working properly. If you enjoy the "Simon's Cat" animated shorts, or just love adorable animated kitty cats, you'll likely enjoy this game.

I enjoy it, hoping to see new bonus plays in the near future.  Update. New update does not run smoothly. Controls stick my cat gets stuck in slide, doesnt respond to dash at timed or will jump instead of slide.

comments: Bowls bowling 3D It's a terrific game, fun and skill in deed! One recommendation; have more head to head without having to bet any coins. Betting for some reason slows the game and puts the players in a defensive position when ranked in a lessor tier. It's fun just to play and find people who also just want to have fun without that betting pressure. Make it more friendly, so the players can compete w each other not only to win coins! Please!

1 star as the game stands at the moment. There is an exploitable cheat mode where a player can make the opening shot very short  against a nearby part of the pier. Once that is done the second player cannot make a shot.  This is used far too often by cheating players.  Sort this and the game is playable.

A play mode which would follow  miniature  golf  a little  with small  elevation changes , off camber spots , obstacles  jump water , ramp threw tire. Different  playing fields like open parks with bench seats and walking stones for Hazzard.  The pier is cool to play on ,put some open knot holes on it for Hazzard. Multiple  modes to choose  from. The strait up mode is nice ...  but could  be better.  I like world league  it's a blast  and I'm doing very well in it. I gave you a 4star  app plays smooth  and the game itself  is fun. I'll be waiting for the upgrades.

TONY Revised from 2 stars to 4 stars as this as said before is an excellent game would have been 5 stars if it was not for the fact the top 10 or so players have a way to cheat without playing a game. So annoying and unfair. I suggest blanket the top 20 or so players to the same prize or find a way to stop them. Cheers for a great game though

Marc This game has made a big improvement since I last uninstalled. The is however a major glitch. When the Jack goes in the water it is replaced back where it started. This allows the leading player a massive advantage as all they need to do is pin the jack and will never lose an end, if the Jack is shot out please either play a dead end or put the Jack in the middle. More experienced players play the Jack to the side every time because they know they will win the end. Alternatively put a barrier in.

Fairly addictive I've grown to love this game. The gameplay is pretty smooth, with just an occasional hiccup. My one gripe is that it can take a while for the game to find you someone to play! By the way, how do you get into Season 3?

this game is a thousand times better than agar.io in my opinion! It's so much easier to get onto the leader board. Every time I play I get onto the leader board. descriptionHTML:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
